edit.title: Edit Event
edit.name: Name
edit.requirementsPlaceholderDE: Event Anforderungen auf Deutsch (getrennt durch Zeilenumbruch, verwende ! als 1. Zeile um alle Anforderungen zu überschreiben)
edit.requirementsPlaceholderEN: Event requirements in English (separated by new lines, use ! als 1st line to overwrite all requirements

details.erlebniscardInfo: Tickets without Erlebnis Card are only available at our tourist offices and cost 15 EUR. For more information about the Erlebnis Card visit: https://www.region-villach.at/en/offers/region-villach-card-2505115.html
details.noreginfo: In order to register for the event please contact us via email, phone or Whatsapp.
details.name: Name
details.nameTip: First- and last name of the participant
details.emailTip: Valid email address of the participant
details.phoneTip: Valid phone nr. for further inquiries or changes
details.accommodationTip: Name of your accommodation (empty if you are from here)
details.agreement: This registration is nonbinding. It's only for Alpbrothers to organize the event accurate. There will be no costs or duties on both sides caused by the registration. The participant agrees that Alpbrothers stores the entered personal data in order to organize the event.
details.furtherInfo: For further information please contact us by Email or phone.
details.noRegsRemaining: We are sorry, the event is already fully booked. Nevertheless you can register yourself. If Dieses Event ist leider bereits ausgebucht. Sie können sich dennoch anmelden. Sollte ein Platz frei werden kontaktieren wir Sie telefonisch.
